action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Scythe or Soul Bolt attacks.

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Soul Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d10 + 4}) necrotic damage. If the target has the {@condition frightened} condition, the giant gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.
